Reviews.Content: located st vincent hospital campus obvious choice close daughter patient st vincent staff incredibly courteous helpful refrigerator microwave handy extended stay didnt chance eat restaurant spent majority time hospital highly recommend hotel close st vincents hospital 86th

Reviews.Content: hotel campus st vincents medical center uniquely situated visiting hospital shuttle hotel hospital house reasonably priced result arent perks traveler expect shampoo comes packet refrigerator coffee maker huge bed exercise expected acceptable quick workout stay week restaurant closes 9 pm bit stay clean quiet recommend hotel hotel close st vincents
